title: Client Won't Launch - Riot Client Process is already running
body:
Hi guys,

When I launch the client it shows a screen saying 'Repairing'. this partially loads and then I get "Process Already Running'.

I have reinstalled twice, and used the Hextect repair tool. League will reinstall, patch, and then I can play. Yet if I close the program I can't reopen it again as I get the same error.

HELP! Please.

Best,

Andrew

replies.body: running it as administrator fixed it for me

1. Ensure both your anti-virus and firewall have exceptions for League processes.
2. Update your GPU drivers.
3. Submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

I'm afraid this issue is unusual enough I don't totally know where to start. Player Support will be your best resource if 1 and 2 don't help.
